name: xml element without attribute
description: select all xml elements invoke without bpelx:inputHeaderVariable attribute
content:
<invoke name="abcdef"
                partnerLink="abcdef"
                portType="abcdef"
                operation="abcdef"
                inputVariable="abcdef"
                outputVariable="abcdef"
                bpelx:invokeAsDetail="no"/>
  
  
  <invoke name="abcdef"
                partnerLink="abcdef"
                portType="abcdef"
                operation="abcdef"
                inputVariable="abcdef"
                outputVariable="abcdef"
                bpelx:invokeAsDetail="no"
                bpelx:inputHeaderVariable="abcdef"/>

                partnerLink="abcdef"
                portType="abcdef"
                operation="abcdef"
                inputVariable="abcdef"
                outputVariable="abcdef"
                bpelx:invokeAsDetail="no"/>
